name: @plurimath/plurimath
description: Convert mathematical formulas between formats (MathML, OMMX, LatexMath, AsciiMath).

scripts.test:rb: npm run podman:bundle && podman run --rm -it -v.:/srv:z plurimath-js /bin/bash -c cd /srv && /bin/bash dev/spec_plurimath.sh
scripts.podman:bundle: podman run --rm -it -v.:/srv:z plurimath-js /bin/bash -c cd /srv && bundle install && ./setup.sh && ./build.sh
scripts.build: npm run podman:build && npm run podman:bundle
scripts.submodule:init: git submodule init && npm run submodule:update

author: Ribose Inc.
